title: Introducing NBA Power Ratings And Playoff Odds FiveThirtyEight » DataLab | FiveThirtyEight

type_specific.selection: Starting this week, with the help of basketball analytics experts Jeremias Engelmann and Steve Ilardi, we’re rolling out weekly NBA power rankings fueled by ESPN’s Real Plus-Minus player ratings. These power ratings predict how well each team will perform over the coming week of games; we’ll also list each team’s projected end-of-season win total and […]
